meanings.definition: Not able to be captured or caught.
meanings.sent1: The elusive butterfly was uncapturable by the young girl.
meanings.sent2: The ghost was uncapturable by any means known to man.
meanings.sent3: The uncapturable squirrel kept outsmarting the determined cat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an uncapturable melody, fleeting yet beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The uncapturable essence of freedom lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Impossible to be captured or confined.
meanings.sent1: The magician's uncapturable tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The wild spirit of the horse was truly uncapturable.
meanings.sent3: The uncapturable balloon floated away, leaving the children in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her uncapturable energy lit up the room like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The uncapturable beauty of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold.

meanings.definition: Incapable of being captured or seized.
meanings.sent1: The uncapturable thief always managed to escape the police.
meanings.sent2: The uncapturable secret remained hidden for generations.
meanings.sent3: The uncapturable fish in the pond seemed to mock the fishermen.
meanings.sent4: His uncapturable dreams soared beyond the limits of reality.
meanings.sent5: The uncapturable essence of time slipped through their fingers.
